content:
This morning, the Russian army fired at the city of Krasnogorivka in Donetsk region from artillery, is dead.

About thisreportedHead of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin.

“One person was killed as a result of the firing of Krasnogorivka. This morning, the Russians fired at the city of artillery tightly-a 72-year-old man was a deadly wound, ”he said.

According to the head of Ova, Krasnogorivka has been on the front line for ten years, and it becomes more dangerous to stay there every day.

“Please all: take care of yourself and your loved ones! Evacuate in a timely manner! ” - said Vadim Filashkin.

As reported by the Armyinform, the troops of the Russian Federation fired at Kupyansky district,A woman was killed.
title: Krasnohivka under a dense artworker of Russians: there is a dead
